    • Uses of File in de.espirit.firstspirit.service.mediamanagement

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void UploadHook.postProcess​(BaseContext baseContext, Media media, File file, long length)

      void UploadHook.preProcess​(BaseContext baseContext, Media media, File file, InputStream inputStream, long length)
      Hook method will be called on media upload BEFORE the uploaded file will be transmitted to the FirstSpirit-Server-Repository.
